data.name: Do U Copy?
data.description:
***LIMITED DISCOUNT // 45% OFF at LAUNCH***

Looking for a party game experience with only one headset on hand? 
We got you covered.

There is no better feeling than earning money through hard work and perseverance… until you play Do U Copy? !   

Do U Copy? is a VR co-op game for friends, family and couples who wants to put their communication skills to the test! 

  In Do U Copy?, robbing a bank becomes a cooperative business. 

Play as the Thief and make your way through one of the (least) secured banks in the country. Avoid traps, guards and camera using your VR legs and the guidance of your « guy-in-the-chair ».   

OR

Play as the Hacker, become the eyes and ears of the operations through your phone, tablet or laptop!  Using your (un)realistic skills, hack through the bank securities, guide your ally and solve engaging puzzles with unexpected turns! 

Do U Copy? requires a minimum of 2 players to be played. 
Get the Hacker App at https://www.fugamestudio.com
